about_the_game:
Welcome to... Tomorrow's Land!
An pirate-exploration game.

Gameplay:

  • Classic keyboard controls like in the 1990s. For example, "Combo Attack: X + X + X."

  • Servers can host up to 50 players (with over 100/1000 servers available. Due to budget constraints, only 100 servers will be opened initially, allowing up to 5,000 players to play at the same time ^^!).

  • Guilds are limited to a maximum of 10 members. Players can make friends and participate in events together.

  • PvP between players allows the winner to earn a portion of the Bounty.

  • Guild PvP is a ship battle, where roles include a ship captain, gunners who use cannons to attack from a distance, warriors to defend the ship from raids, and fighters who use cannons to board the enemy ship and fight. The side that destroys the other ship will receive a portion of the defeated guild’s assets.

Activities:

  • PvP Arena Event: 1v1, up to 16 players from each server who register early. Held at 12:00 AM, 4:00 AM, 8:00 AM, 12:00 PM, 4:00 PM, and 8:00 PM.

  • Treasure Hunt Event: Treasure chests randomly appear on islands, and anyone from any server can join. To open the chest, players must complete mini-games such as Sudoku, etc. (There are 10 mini-games in total). Held at 1:05 AM, 5:05 AM, 9:05 AM, 1:05 PM, 5:05 PM, and 9:05 PM.

  • Boss Hunt Event: Bosses appear on maps at fixed locations on islands, and everyone from all servers can join. Held at 2:05 AM, 6:05 AM, 10:05 AM, 2:05 PM, 6:05 PM, and 10:05 PM.

  • Sea Boss Hunt Event: Sea bosses appear at fixed coordinates on the ocean, and anyone from any server can join. Sea bosses are immune to player damage and can only be damaged by ship cannons. However, beware, as other guilds may attack. Held at 2:05 AM, 6:05 AM, 10:05 AM, 2:05 PM, 6:05 PM, and 10:05 PM.

  • At every hour, there will be an Equipment Shop and Auction Shop.

Features:

  • Daily Quests: They all involve Chemistry and Math, as it’s my dream to create a game where players can both play and learn ^^!

  • Players can trade items with each other in-game (limited to in-game items only).

  • There’s an Item Auction System where players can provide items for auction in-game.

  • There’s a Rock-Paper-Scissors feature between players.

  • Equipment Enhancement System.

  • Top Bounty Ranking System: Resets to zero on the first day of every month.

  • Players can catch and raise pets.

And many more features that haven’t been listed yet!

short_description: Step into Tomorrow's Land, an open-world action-adventure filled with chemistry-driven mechanics. Engage in thrilling PvP battles, hunt for hidden treasures, and uncover the secrets scattered across a vast and mysterious world. Every hour brings new events like boss fights and treasure hunts.
